name: Lugg
headline: Move anything, anytime, anywhere
description:
Lugg is building the best way for you to get anything moved. With the push of a button, you are connected to movers and a truck. They make it dead simple to get your new furniture home, your craigslist purchases delivered to you, and moving all of your stuff into your new apartment.

They are located in San Francisco and well-funded by some of the greatest investors in the world, like A-Capital, Sequoia Capital, SV Angel, and Y Combinator.

They are a small team with incredibly hard problems to solve. They are hiring and would love to hear from you! hello@Lugg.com

Download Lugg and let them be your friend with a truck! http://lugg.com

## Millions of happy customers
They were so great moving the couch we got off of Facebook! They were super easy to communicate with as well!
MMarquisha in Los Angeles, CA
5.0
Isidro and Christian were the BEST so glad I got paired with them as they truly went above and beyond. Made sure the order was ready, were patient, efficient and helpful. It‚Äôs people like them that make me want to use Lugg more often! Thank you so much! 
LLuisa in Santa Fe Springs, CA
5.0
Adolfo and David went above and beyond and they were so careful with our sofa. They made sure to keep the sofa in pristine condition. I would recommend them to anyone!

5.0
Excellent service. So quick and very helpful and polite. Great experience. Definitely using you guys again.

5.0

They were super patient and helped assemble the furniture and place it the way we wanted. Highly recommend!

5.0

5.0

MMarci in Beaverton, OR

Hussain and Yolando powered through a much heavier than expected lift to get my wardrobe upstairs and into our bedroom! Honestly, there was a point where I was ready to give up, but they made it happen. The real deal.

Had an awesome experience with Gabriel & Gerardo! They made everything simple and stress free for us!!

5.0
Fantastic job, everything exactly as scheduled and planned, great communication. Made getting a kitchen table delivered SO EFFORTLESS. Love this app.
KKyrsten in Marina del Rey, CA
5.0
Excellent communication!!!!! Not only did the app keep me updated but Diego and Julio called when 10 away from any destination. Raining that day so I ordered a van. Items were Plastic wrapped with moving blankets during move. Everything was delivered unscathed. A bit more than I would have liked to spend but the peace of mind about needing to find movers and vehicle.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Lugg**

**Mission:**
Lugg's mission is succinct and powerful: "Move anything, anytime, anywhere." They strive to be the simplest solution to moving needs, connecting users to trucks and drivers with just the push of a button.

**Founding & Background:**
Founded in 2014 and initially part of the Y Combinator Batch S15, Lugg started in San Francisco. Over the years, it has attracted significant investment from top-tier backers such as A-Capital, Sequoia Capital, SV Angel, and Y Combinator itself.

**Services Offered:**
Lugg's platform provides on-demand moving services and furniture delivery. Users can schedule movers to transport furniture, large purchases from Craigslist or Facebook Marketplace, office items, and even handle junk removal. The system operates on your timetable, with real-time tracking and a range of vehicle sizes to fit different moving scenarios.

- **Key Services Include:**
  - Home and apartment moving
  - College and office moves
  - Furniture and appliance delivery
  - Junk removal and donation pickups
  
**User Experience:**
Customers rave about Lugg's efficiency, professionalism, and care taken with their belongings. The 5-star rated service ensures vetted movers with ratings based on real customer feedback. It's akin to ‚ÄúUber for moving,‚Äù where reliability meets convenience.

**Team & Hiring:**
Lugg operates with a compact team of around 50 employees, tackling the demanding challenges of logistics head-on. They're constantly looking to expand and welcome talent interested in solving meaningful problems. If you‚Äôre interested in joining, your chance to jump on board is here‚Äîreach out at hello@Lugg.com.

**Location:**
Based in the bustling tech scene of San Francisco, Lugg is perfectly situated to cater to a rapidly growing market for quick and reliable moving solutions.

**Conclusion:**
If you‚Äôre looking for a hassle-free way to move items across town or need help transporting your latest online purchase, Lugg is worth your consideration. Download the app and experience the ease of moving anything, anytime, anywhere.

For more information, check their website: [Lugg.com](http://lugg.com).
